title: Edgar Degas - Documentary Collection
description:
â€˜Art is not what you see,but what you make others seeâ€™ Edgar Degas


Currently there is an exhibition at the NGV in Melbourne of Degasâ€™ most significant painting and sculpture.  


This is a comprehensive collection of English language documentaries on Degas from such sources as the BBC, RMArts, Kultur, HistoryChannel and the CBC. Go to Youtube and Dailymotion for other useful material.

These are DVD files but compressed by about half by Cinema Craft Encoder i.e they are as good as the originals.

In ebooks I am also uploading a collection of books on Degas. Kindly seed (and note that when the upload is complete, I will only be able to continue seeding for a week or two.)
